name: perseveringly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves continuing to make an effort to do or achieve something, even when this is difficult or takes a long time: He perseveringly followed this foolish course of action. She perseveringly tried to come up with a satisfactory answer to the problem.
More examplesFewer examplesThey have perseveringly held on to their principles in spite of public pressure.She continued to study for her exams tirelessly and perseveringly.They were fishing perseveringly, but had still not caught anything.
